title: [Client] The Poro King gamemode status fails to display correctly when ending a Poro King match.
body:
The Poro King game mode status fails to display correctly when ending a match of Legend of the Poro King gametype using League of Legends game client patch 5.24.15_12_04_13_35.

Steps:
1. Launch the app.
2. Proceed to a "Legend of the Poro King" Gamemode
3. Complete the match.
4. Observe the screen results located in the top left quadrant of the screen.

Results:
The Poro King game mode status fails to display correctly.

Expected results:
I expected the Poro King gamemode to display instead of a placeholder reading "kingporo_game_mode_name"

replies.body:
Hello! 

Happy Snowdown! Thanks for reporting this! You did an awesome job listing out the repro steps, which makes it super easy to see what's going on! We're currently investigating the issue.
Can people actually check if the issue has been reported already? I see like 10 posts on the same issue, one after another

Thank you for your prompt response.

I work as a QA tester and look out for any issues I find.

Have a great Snowdown and Happy Holidays.
